about_the_game:
Howling Dusk is a single-player first-person survival game set in a large open-world island wilderness environment where the player must maintain vitals such as hunger and thirst while avoiding attacks by predators, and extreme weather, and disease. It blends emotional experiences from a peaceful almost meditative natural setting to moments of suspense and fear. The game is targeted at the teen to mature, casual, or hardcore survival game players on a PC platform.

Features
  • Large interactable realistic open-world environment
  • Building and crafting systems using raw materials from the environment
  • Freedom to explore and build
  • Daytime/ nighttime and change of seasons
  • Choice of starting scenarios
  • RPG style leveling and skill-building
  • Realistic Survival experience.
  • Variety of wildlife for players to interact with
